name: Korean BBQ Short Ribs (Gal-Bi)
author: funinthesun
summary: This is a easy way to make Korean BBQ. You can also substitute chicken breast or sliced rib-eye for the short ribs. If you use chicken or rib-eye, you must add thinly sliced green onion tops. This can also be broiled in the oven for the same amount of time.
ingredients: 3 pounds Korean-style short ribs (beef chuck flanken, cut 1/3 to 1/2 inch thick across bones)
directions: Pour soy sauce, water, and vinegar into a large, non-metallic bowl
Whisk in brown sugar, white sugar, pepper, sesame oil, garlic, and onion until the sugars have dissolved
Submerge the ribs in this marinade, and cover with plastic wrap
Refrigerate 7 to 12 hours; the longer, the better
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat
Remove ribs from the marinade, shake off excess, and discard the marinade
Cook on preheated grill until the meat is no longer pink, 5 to 7 minutes per side
